alternativeNames:
Kubo-san Does Not Allow Me
Kubo-san Doesn't Leave Me (a Mob) Be / Kubo-san Doesn't Leave Me Be (a Mob)
Kubo-san ne laisse pas moi (une personne de la cohue) tranquille
Kubo-san no me deja / Kubo-san no me deja ser (un personaje de fondo)
Kubo-san Tidak Mau Membiarkanku (Seorang Jelata) Sendirian
Кубо-сан не прощает меня (моба)
久保さんは僕(モブ)を許さない
久保同学不放过我 / 久保同學不放過我
쿠보 양은 나를 내버려 두지 않아
author: Yukimori Nene
